title: Only 3 Polar Bears left - help me finish!
author: Moose117

posts.post_title: Only 3 Polar Bears left - help me finish!
posts.post_content:
I'm down to my final 2...and ready to cross the finish line!
Looking for the following cards to complete my binder:

Knight, Jack (With Bat)
O'Brien, Peter

Thanks for looking!

Somebody? Anybody?! Please take my money!!
